description:
This market refers to the LoL match between Ovos Moles eSports and Periquitos Zangados in the LPLOL Group B, scheduled for February 13 at 3:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Ovos Moles eSports" if Ovos Moles eSports win the match against Periquitos Zangados.

This market will resolve to "Periquitos Zangados" if Periquitos Zangados win the match against Ovos Moles eSports.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://gol.gg/esports/home, not including broadcasts, streams, or other video feeds.
